partintro.title: Document structure
partintro.para: Various appendixes outside the reference documentation.
describes how to integrate Gemini Blueprint with Eclipse Plug-in Development Environment.
describes the Gemini Blueprint Maven 2 archetype usage.
provides some useful OSGi tips, especially meaningful when used along with Gemini Blueprint.

describes some features that are included in the 1.0 distribution but are still considered early-access. The externals of these features may change in future releases. This appendix also discusses other planned features for which no implementation yet exists.
describes the repository used by Gemini Blueprint for its osgi artifacts.
